summary: This is a memorandum from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General documenting a voluntary interview conducted on July 15, 2021, with a Federal Bureau of Prisons Electronics Technician at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. The interview is part of the OIG's investigation into the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein, who was housed at MCC New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the OIG investigation; he was an inmate housed at MCC New York who died.

events.title: OIG Interview of BOP Electronics Technician
events.description: Senior Special Agent and Special Agent from the DOJ OIG conducted a voluntary, recorded interview with a BOP Electronics Technician at MCC New York regarding the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York
MCC New York Special Housing Unit
keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General (OIG) is conducting an investigation into the death of BOP inmate Jeffrey Epstein.
The interview subject was the Electronics Technician at MCC New York when Epstein was housed there.
The interview was recorded and transcribed on July 15, 2021.
Jeffrey Epstein's BOP register number was 76318-054.
The document is an internal OIG memorandum and is not to be distributed outside the receiving agency.
